title: i_am_viral
author: i_am_viral
content: It’s been a while I’ve felt like this, feels bad, disgusting but nothing new. I am faking 30 years old, when you get 30 and until you get there life is not going to get better, you are going to feel and get to know a lot of bad shit, meet a lot of shit people and get more and more disappointed in what the world is like.

comments.author: Israelgogo
comments.body: Hate and jealousy is part of life ,it comes willingly to some people ,All you need to do as human is too do your best  ,be good at all time ,knowing fully well that people will always talk about you be it good or bad ,just keep been you,it very easy for people to judge you while they think they perfect ,there is no person without a fault, even a preacher is disliked by his own people .In some cases we register hate in our mind ,thinking people are jealous of us and hating on us while we channel on the way we act towards them and it affects the relationship with them.

comments.author: bmwister
comments.body: I hope that everything is fine now, but this world is cruel and unfair, you can ask yourself: why is this with me? But nothing will change. You need to surround yourself with good people, move away from those who bring you sadness and change your place of work, life, which does not bring you joy. And most importantly, rejoice in your victories and do not stop. 'Cause life is cool

comments.author: ammodotcom
comments.body: Quote from: i_am_viral on May 20, 2022, 09:41:01 PMIt’s been a while I’ve felt like this, feels bad, disgusting but nothing new. I am faking 30 years old, when you get 30 and until you get there life is not going to get better, you are going to feel and get to know a lot of bad shit, meet a lot of shit people and get more and more disappointed in what the world is like.You can't control all of your circumstances. You can only control your actions and your outlook. These may be limited powers, but they are often all someone needs to find happiness.

comments.author: Bitcoins101
comments.body: Quote from: i_am_viral on May 20, 2022, 09:41:01 PMIt’s been a while I’ve felt like this, feels bad, disgusting but nothing new. I am faking 30 years old, when you get 30 and until you get there life is not going to get better, you are going to feel and get to know a lot of bad shit, meet a lot of shit people and get more and more disappointed in what the world is like.I once knew a guy that dated strippers and then complained that all of his girlfriends were thieving, lying, cheating whores. What did he expect? Intelligent, honest, good people do exist, but you're probably not associating with the right people or in the right place. The world can be a great place once you get out of our dirty, consumerism-obsessed cities.

comments.author: Crpyto hunter
comments.body: Jealousy come in when you have so many people you air out your mind set to, that when you've problem you can't settle it by yourself,That when a problem is been drive to your corner people come in to give you advice.And what will expire you most is to see your follow meet h with his/herFriend walking, Orh  shopping Coming to see your relationship with your partner is not like what you see Orh what you should air out in your group,It becomes shameful to walk with your partner out so that you may not see your friends.Jealousy come in when you see you partner walking with people you shouldn't love to.It bring lies to both of them when they're not truthful to themselves.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Dude you need to stop being so negative, 30 is young, you have your whole life ahead of you. Try & be more positive, you can do anything you put your mind to, within reason.

comments.author: Qiubell5
comments.body: not everyone in this world is bad. You will definitely find good people. stay optimistic.

comments.author: sysoe
comments.body: I understand how you feel. It’s hard to deal with the challenges and disappointments that life throws at us. But I don’t think that life is only bad and hopeless. I think that there are also good things and opportunities that we can attract if we just stay positive. Remember that thoughts become things, so keep it positive.

comments.author: wagmipope
comments.body: Quote from: i_am_viral on May 20, 2022, 09:41:01 PMIt’s been a while I’ve felt like this, feels bad, disgusting but nothing new. I am faking 30 years old, when you get 30 and until you get there life is not going to get better, you are going to feel and get to know a lot of bad shit, meet a lot of shit people and get more and more disappointed in what the world is like.Lol that's poetry fren

comments.author: Pingrapole
comments.body: Jealousy destroys people, so people should live from envy and not be jealous of little things in life because life can be big and small because now we are alive so big So now instead of thinking so much about violence, try to think of something good to do, then the future will be bright, and the bad thoughts will be removed from within I said this much from my little knowledge.Be good to yourself, think good, make yourself good, be patient, stay away from envy or bad thoughts, then you will become a good minded person and you will achieve success.If everyone in the world was bad, the world would not be able to run. Everyone is the same or in the vicinity of bad people, so it seems that when you come with good people, your thinking will change, and you will see everything better life.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: i_am_viral on May 20, 2022, 09:41:01 PMIt’s been a while I’ve felt like this, feels bad, disgusting but nothing new. I am faking 30 years old, when you get 30 and until you get there life is not going to get better, you are going to feel and get to know a lot of bad shit, meet a lot of shit people and get more and more disappointed in what the world is like.You need Jesus. Watch the recent movie, "The Jesus Revolution." It's a documentary of things that really happened in Costa Mesa, Calif., back in the 1970s... regarding Calvary Chapel. https://calvarychapel.com/Jesus gives meaning to your life.
